keywords: Big Tech financial services market share
strategy: The DeepCrawlerAgent will execute a targeted crawling strategy focused on identifying emerging substitute products and services within the FinTech sector. It will leverage the specified keywords to pinpoint discussions, reports, and analyses concerning alternative financial platforms, disruptive technologies, and shifts in consumer behavior over the last 6-12 months. The agent will prioritize sources detailing adoption rates, market penetration of new alternatives, and the strategic responses of incumbent financial institutions to these evolving threats. Emphasis will be placed on identifying technologies like AI, blockchain, and open banking initiatives that enable novel substitute offerings, analyzing their potential to displace existing financial products and services.
